solution_line_template: Each hour contains {minutes_per_hour} minutes, so after {hours_spent} hours he took {hours_spent}*{minutes_per_hour} = <<{hours_spent}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes_spent}>>{total_minutes_spent} minutes.

If each question takes {minutes_per_question} minutes, then he answered {total_minutes_spent}/{minutes_per_question} = <<{total_minutes_spent}/{minutes_per_question}={questions_answered}>>{questions_answered} questions.
